game.title: The Mysterious Map Quest
game.objective: Uncover the map to the lost treasure
game.description: Discover the map in the old library, overcome spirit guardians, and embark on your quest for the hidden riches. Your reward will be 1500 golden coins.

task.objective: Find the map in the library's hidden chamber
task.description: Enter the enchanted forest, follow the ancient tapestry to reach the library. Once there, search for the secret passage that leads to the treasure map.
